Identity.History: During his reign, Nastasen defeated an invasion of Kush from Upper Egypt led by Khabbash, a local ruler of Upper Egypt who had campaigned against the Persians around 338 BC. The invasion was a failure and Nastasen acquired many fine boats and other booty during his victory.
Identity.Tooltip: Hero Special: "Gift of Warships" - Allows the training of Ptolemaic trireme-class ships.
